data.title: Hidden Gem in Old Town Camarillo
data.text: Very nice small family owned wine bar with great selection of wines, they have added food choices recently

data.title: Snobs
data.text: I went here to try some wine. I don't live far from here and decided to do some wine tasting. First of all, the lady that was working there did not acknowledge me there. I said hi and stood by the counter to ask for a tasting. She looked at me briefly and continued to talk to another lady that clearly was not even there for a tasting. She ignored me for 20 min. Finished her conversation then looked at me as if she was bothered that she had to work. I asked for a tasting and it seemed to put her out. She was short, not friendly and it made me feel uncomfortable. Poor atmosphere and company. I do not recommend this place at all. The people that work here are rude and seem to not like their job. It's not a real wine tasting. It's store bought wine.

data.title: intimate little place run by great people
data.text: So this is a wine bar basically with some great snacking options. Great cheeses and different plates. I have been in probably 6 times now and never had a bad experience. It is located in the artsy "Old Town Camarillo" area and I think this place adds to the experience. Reasonable tastings and really the place is friendly probably because the owners are and love what they do.
